title: Question
description: Describe one of the questions on a ballot

question.title: The Question
question.description: The human-readable question posed to voters

choices.title: The Choices
choices.description: The choices voters may select from. Abstain should always be an option and should not be reflected in the question itself

supplemental.title: Question Supplemental Information
supplemental.description: This should be a URI pointing to additional information or clarification about the question that is not strictly necessary for validation.

maxChoices.title: Maximum Choices
maxChoices.description: Used for multiple or ranked choice votes. Represents the maximum amount of options a user may select per the voting authority. Do not provide if no limit.
